alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 2:41PM EDT until July 30 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Water begins inundating Wolverine Road just north of the Hays Depot bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 27.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding but will continue to run high through this evening. - Action stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 9 PM.
